displayTitle.title: Display title
displayTitle.description: When viewing a block - this is the title that will be displayed on the page

_classes.title: Classes
_classes.description: Used to style or manipulate the look and feel of this Block. These are predefined in the theme or added in Project Settings > Custom CSS/Less code.

_isOptional.title: Is this optional?
_isOptional.description: An optional block does not have to be completed, nor do any of the components contained within it.

_isAvailable.title: Is this available?
_isAvailable.description: Controls whether this block and its contents are available in the course or not.

_isHidden.title: Is this hidden?
_isHidden.description: Enabling this is equivalent to applying the CSS 'display:none' to the block.

_isVisible.title: Is this visible?
_isVisible.description: Disabling this is equivalent to applying the CSS 'visibility:hidden' to the block.

_ariaLevel.title: Aria level
_ariaLevel.description: If you need to override the default block ARIA level (as defined in Configuration Settings), set this to any number greater than 0.

_onScreen.title: On-screen classes
_onScreen.description: These settings allow you to attach classes to the block when it is within the browser's viewport; helpful for running CSS-based animations on blocks as they scroll into view.

_classes.title: Classes
_classes.description: The CSS class(es) to add to the block element.

_percentInviewVertical.title: Percent in view
_percentInviewVertical.description: Controls what percentage of the block's height needs to be in the viewport in order for the CSS class(es) to be added.
